scenes.description: Transition and loading screen with a 'TIPS' message.
Performance of the song 'Monochrome 〜 version de l'apprivoiser'.

subtitles.original:
TIPS
Dr. Oopsie does not, in fact, fix any mistakes in your life.
However, it could definitely create new ones, so please drink responsibly.
- Tentacult Health Department
subtitles.english:
TIPS
Dr. Oopsie does not, in fact, fix any mistakes in your life.
However, it could definitely create new ones, so please drink responsibly.
- Tentacult Health Department

subtitles.original: 舞いゆくは　星のかけら
subtitles.english: Falling are fragments of stars

subtitles.original: 天体に　手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: I reach my hand out to the celestial bodies

subtitles.original: 行き交う願い　感じているね
subtitles.english: I can feel the passing wishes, can't I?

subtitles.original: すべては今　モノクロームの　なか
subtitles.english: Everything is now within the monochrome

subtitles.original:
モノクローム 〜 version de l'apprivoiser
Lyrics: こだまさおり Composition: 神前 暁 Arrangement: 高田龍一
subtitles.english:
Monochrome 〜 version de l'apprivoiser
Lyrics: Saori Kodama Composition: Satoru Kosaki Arrangement: Ryuichi Takada

subtitles.original: 白く　こぼれだす吐息
subtitles.english: A white breath spilling out

subtitles.original: 消えかけた　言葉の形
subtitles.english: The shape of words that were about to fade

subtitles.original: きゅっと　ぬくもりの分だけ
subtitles.english: Just by the amount of warmth tightly held

subtitles.original: 空はほんのり　明るくなった
subtitles.english: The sky became slightly brighter

subtitles.original: 悲しみに　濡れた翼
subtitles.english: Wings soaked in sadness

subtitles.original: 重なりあう　純白へ
subtitles.english: Towards the overlapping pure white

subtitles.original: 渡しあった　未来への　やさしい勇気
subtitles.english: The gentle courage for the future we passed to each other

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない　世界の
subtitles.english: Of a world that no one knows

subtitles.original: 夜明けを待っている鼓動
subtitles.english: A heartbeat waiting for the dawn

subtitles.original: 痛みをつれて　旅だつ私
subtitles.english: Carrying the pain, I set out on a journey

subtitles.original: はじまる明日へ
subtitles.english: Towards the tomorrow that begins

subtitles.original: 舞いゆくは　星のかけら
subtitles.english: Falling are fragments of stars

subtitles.original: 天体に　手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: I reach my hand out to the celestial bodies

subtitles.original: 行き交う願い　信じているよ
subtitles.english: I believe in the passing wishes

subtitles.original: すべては今　モノクロームの　なか
subtitles.english: Everything is now within the monochrome

subtitles.original: 凍えた　記憶を溶かす
subtitles.english: Melting the frozen memories

subtitles.original: 手に入れた　愛とともに
subtitles.english: Together with the love I've obtained

subtitles.original: 振りむかずに　風あおぐ空の彼方
subtitles.english: Beyond the sky where I look up at the wind without looking back

subtitles.original: それぞれが　たどる軌道
subtitles.english: The orbits that each of us follows

subtitles.original: たとえもう　逢えなくても
subtitles.english: Even if we can't meet again

subtitles.original: 光が見せる　銀河のどこかで　つながっているね
subtitles.english: We are connected somewhere in the galaxy that the light shows

subtitles.original: 散る星は　砂のように
subtitles.english: The falling stars are like sand

subtitles.original: まなこを　あまく撫でる
subtitles.english: Gently stroking my eyes
